document_data.name: Golden Sails
document_data.mainbody: The '''Golden Sails''' served as the navy of [[Suldolphor]] in eastern [[Calimshan]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Golden Sails were based out of Suldolphor, the Golden City, and were active along [[Talagath's Gauntlet]].
document_data.Organization: By the {{YearlinkName|1367}}, the Golden Sails were composed of a dozen well-trained quick cutters. The sleek ships were aided by members of the [[Flame Guard]], as well as by special [[spell]]s developed by [[Neirshyn Fallowfar]] that prevented them from capzising.
document_data.Activities: Ships from the Golden Sails protected Suldolphor's harbor and their trade interests on the waters between the [[Lake of Steam]] and the [[Shining Sea]].
